text: Tallon Griekspoor was the defending champion but lost in the final to Mikael Ymer. Ymer won the title after defeating Griekspoor 6–3, 5–7, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Tampere Open - Men's Singles 2019 Men's Singles
title: 2019 Tampere Open – Men's Singles
